Name: Sea of Flowers in the Valley
Description: Maqi is trying to contact you, and it appears to be related to the Pioneer Association's ambitious project, "Second Coming of Solaris"...
QuestDesc: Maqi is trying to contact you, and it appears to be related to the Pioneer Association's ambitious project, "Second Coming of Solaris"...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me explain our job today.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In this chapter, they passed right by a valley on their way to Mt. Moore.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It goes: "We ventured through the valley as the night fell..."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "In the sole darkness of night, the Sea of Flowers seemed to fall noir... Pressed between petals and leaves, we walked as clothes uttered gentle friction..."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Pale and silent as it was, the night permitted our disturbing existence. No, I heard murmurs upon the waves, saying "O travelers O winds..."

Options.PlotLineKey: A relaxing scene, as it is.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. I find inner peace in this.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But to think of what comes after this chapter, I slow down my pace...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, we need the reference for the Sea of Flowers to create the valley according to this chapter.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you happen to come across some samples, feel free to drop by.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's beautiful. Thank you for the work. I'll hand it over to the dev team.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It would be easier for them to imagine a sea of flowers with this.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Some time passed while Maqi was away to hand over the item...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you. That wraps up today's work!

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: See you tomorrow, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Linsu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rongqing has told me some about this book.

Dialogues.Speaker: Linsu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can't say I have much experience with stuff like this... I'm just too old for a packed page...

Options.PlotLineKey: I can read the pages to you if you like.

Dialogues.Speaker: Linsu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're so sweet. Just tell me if you want to buy some <ano=Bonsai>Penjing</ano>. I'm giving you discounts!

Options.PlotLineKey: Anything similar to what's described in the novel?

Dialogues.Speaker: Linsu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, you certainly can't expect a potted plant to look nearly as impressive as an actual sea of flowers.

Dialogues.Speaker: Linsu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I guess a luxuriant pot of irises may capture the feel.

Dialogues.Speaker: Linsu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It originates from Whining Aix's Mire and its flower language is fragile, untold affections. Romantic, isn't it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Linsu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It has a short flowering season, making it unsuitable for <ano=Bonsai>Penjing</ano>. So we usually don't sell them here. But Verina happened to drop by a few days ago and gave me a few.

Dialogues.Speaker: Linsu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll give one to you if you need it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Linsu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're welcome. Just drop by anytime.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Speaking of the Sea of Flowers, I do visit Bogu's Arbor around the business area when off shift.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you want to inquire about something related to plants, you can ask Grandma Lin, the owner there, for some information.

Dialogues.Speaker: Linsu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rongqing has told me some about this book.
